data.title: Southwest Airlines PHL Terminal – Philadelphia Airport
data.meta_description: Southwest Airlines PHL Terminal at Philadelphia International Airport (PHL): Southwest Airlines uses Terminal E.
data.meta_site_name: Get All Information Related to Airports Terminal Now
data.text:
Southwest Airlines PHL Terminal: The allowance for baggage, the status of flights transfers to airports, entertainment in the flight food and beverages on board, extra assistance, travel for pets reservations management, utilizing facilities or services related to flights There are a myriad of factors a passenger needs to take into consideration and remember in preparing for a flight.

This section provides information pertaining specifically to Southwest Airlines PHL Terminal – Philadelphia International Airport; the details provided here can be utilized to reach the office of the airline or serve as a reference in preparing for the SWA flight that is scheduled to depart and/or arrive to Philadelphia International Airport.

Southwest Airlines PHL Essential Information

All of the essential details regarding the PHL Southwest Airlines terminal are listed here.

Airport Name: Philadelphia International Airport

Terminal: Terminal E

Southwest Airlines PHL Arrivals Terminal: Terminal E

Southwest Airlines PHL Departures Terminal: Terminal E

Airport Code: PHL

PHL Airport Address: 8000 Essington Ave, Philadelphia, PA 19153, United States

Southwest Airlines IATA Code: WN

Southwest Airlines ICAO Code: SWA

Southwest Airlines Ticket Counter Hours All hours of the day, all days of the week.

Country: United States

City: Philadelphia

Southwest Airlines Contact Number: 1 (800) 435-9792

Southwest Airlines Official Website: www.southwest.com

Official YouTube: www.youtube.com/@Southwest

Official Twitter: twitter.com/SouthwestAir

Official Facebook: www.facebook.com/SouthwestAir

Official Instagram: www.instagram.com/southwestair

Services & Amenities Offered at Southwest Airlines PHL Terminal

This office at the Southwest Airlines terminal PHL Airport can be reached for the following services and services:

Ticket Booking and Cancellation

Baggage Allowance

Airport / Online / Self-service Kiosk Check-in

Airport Transfers

Unaccompanied Minor Service

Duty-Free Allowance

In-Flight Meals / Entertainment

Missing / Delayed / Lost Luggage

Airport Lounges

Flight Information / Flight Status

Delayed / Canceled Flights

Airport Facilities

Animal Relief Area

Boarding Class Enquiries

Valet Parking

Airport / Inflight Wi-Fi

Skycap

Rapid Rewards(r)

List of Every Southwest Airlines Terminal Globally

Booking Southwest Airlines Tickets at PHL Terminal

Anyone who wants to make reservations for flights through the airline should contact people who are at the Southwest Airlines PHL terminal office The airline’s representatives have been trained and are equipped with the tools to create itineraries upon request.

Alternately, travelers can purchase tickets for flights on their own through Southwest Airlines’ website and mobile application. Southwest Airlines website and mobile application.

Manage Booking at PHL Terminal

Sometimes, passengers have to modify their reservations or include flight related amenities or services to their travel plans They can choose to manage their reservations on their own on the airline’s website mobile app, or call the team at the office of the Airlines terminal at PHL Airport to get assistance.

Southwest Airlines Cancellation / Refund

Reservations can be cancelled within 10 minutes prior to the flight’s departure time If you cancel Business Select and Anytime fare type reservations, customers are reimbursed for the original method of payment. If the Wanna Get Fare Plus or Wanna Get Fare reservations are cancelled, customers will be refunded through credit cards that can be used to purchase a flight(s) on the next date.

Be aware this: the PHL Southwest Terminal office for Airlines only accepts cancellation requests and refunds of bookings or tickets issued through the official channels of the airline only.

Check-in at Southwest Airlines PHLTerminal

Travelers who fly with SWA have the option of check-in to their flights through the online, mobile or check-in on the airline’s website or mobile app. Alternatively, they can check-in on PHL Airport, the Southwest Airlines terminal PHL Airport.

Check-in via the airline’s mobile and website application is open anytime between 24 hours and one hour prior to departure. the counter at the airport is available one hour before the flight departure time.

Southwest Airlines Flight Status

Passengers can check flight status by contacting the Southwest Airlines PHL terminal office or tracking it by themselves on the airline’s website www.southwest.com/air/flight-status or mobile application.

Southwest Airlines Lost / Delayed / Damaged Baggage at PHL Terminal

If you notice any delayed, damaged or lost baggage, immediately call an airline representative in the baggage claim area or the baggage service office to make an accident report.

For more information or and assistance, please contact the team in the office of the Airlines terminal at PHL Airport.

Transporting Pets Traveling with Pets Southwest Airlines at PHL Airport

The airline provides pets travel services during domestic travel in the United States of America; pet(s) or animal companion(s) are not able to be transported from or to Hawaii to/from other states within the USA.

Pet(s) or animal companion(s) are able to be transported to or from Hawaii to adjacent islands on SWA flights.

Inflight Entertainment by Southwest Airlines

The airline provides its passengers with access to an on-board entertainment portal with an array of films music, shows and more. Passengers are able to stay entertained throughout the flight using this website.

Airlines terminal PHL office will be able to answer any questions relating to entertainment on the plane.

Southwest Airlines Airport Lounge

Unfortunately this airline does not provide lounges at any airport Therefore, passengers will be forced to use the alternatives services or amenities available by Philadelphia International Airport.

If you have any concerns or questions ask any of the Airlines PHL terminal team members.

Car Rental Service at PHL Airport

Check out all available car rental options on the official airport website or ask for more information or assistance from the airport’s staff.
